column1: Güira de Melena is a municipality and town in the Artemisa Province since January 1. of 2011
column2: before it was part of the Havana province. Cuba. It is located on the southern shore of the island
column3: bordering the Bay of Batabanó and on the west part of Cuba . It was founded in 1779.

column1: The town is south of San Antonio de los Baños
column2: west of Quivican and east of Alquízar.

column1: The municipality is divided into the barrios of Gabriel
The principal economic activities include agriculture
column2: especially tobacco; the city has cigar factories. Other agricultural products are potatoes
the municipality of Güira de Melena had a population of 37
column3: 838. With a total area of 178 km2 (69 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 212.6/km2 (551/sq mi).
